title: Meta CEO Zuckerberg Apologizes to Parents at Senate Hearing
description: Meta's CEO Mark Zuckerberg looks on during the Senate Judiciary Committee hearing on online child sexual exploitation at the U.S. Capitol in Washington on Jan. 31, 2024. (Nathan Howard/Reuters)

title: Social Media CEOs Cannot Say They Support New Regulations Focused on Child Sexual Exploitation
description: Meta Founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg testifies before the Senate Judiciary Committee in Washington on Jan. 31, 2024. (Madalina Vasiliu/The Epoch Times)

title: ‘Blood on your hands’: Senators Confront Big Tech CEOs Over Child Safety
description: (Left to right) Discord CEO Jason Citron, Snap co-founder and CEO Evan Spiegel, TikTok CEO Shou Chew, X CEO Linda Yaccarino, and Meta founder and CEO Mark Zuckerberg testify before the Senate Judiciary Committee about big tech and the online child sexual exploitation crisis in Washington, on Jan. 31, 2024. (Madalina Vasiliu/The Epoch Times)

title: ‘Kindness Is Cool’ Videos in Times Square Showcase the Trend of Kindness
description: Gan Jing World promotes a 'Kindness is Cool' video contest on the electronic advertising wall in Times Square. (Shang Jing/New Tang Dynasty TV)

title: Universal Music Accuses TikTok of Bullying, Intimidation in Licensing Negotiations
description: The logo of TikTok on a smartphone in Mulhouse, eastern France, on Oct. 30, 2023. (Sebastien Bozon/AFP via Getty Images)

title: 82,000 Unwanted Texts Equals $300,000 Fine For Australian Business
description: 4WD Supacentre, which sells camping and outdoor gear, was fined over $300,000 for sending 82,000 messages. (Ian Waldie/Getty Images)
